posts.post_title: FT: SC P2 Pin Homerun Baker PSA 8
posts.post_content:
I am looking to trade my SC P2 for some T205 or T206 cards.  I really want a Homerun Baker or Zach Wheat in T205 but would listen to any trades for T205 or T206 cards.  I am just trying to get a set started.
  
I can't get the photos to load so pm me for pics.

What condition T205 Baker are you looking for?

Sent from my SM-N950U using Tapatalk

[quote name="orioles70" post=1864291]What condition T205 Baker are you looking for?

I am pretty open.  Mainly looking for eye appeal.  I guess Fair to Very Good would be great.
